  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_82320</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82320</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical reactions in sealed containers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemische Reaktionen in Siegelbehältern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réactions chimiques dans des récipients 
scellés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reações químicas em uns recipientes selados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazioni chimiche in contenitori sigillati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημικές αντιδράσεις στα σφραγισμένα εμπορευματοκιβώτια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacciones químicas en envases sellados</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the total mass is conserved in the transformation of mercury into mercury oxide inside closed containers.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">closed containers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mercury</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mercury oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Gesamtmasse in 
der Transformation des Quecksilbers in Quecksilberoxid innerhalb der 
geschlossenen Behälter konserviert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que toute la masse est 
économisée dans la transformation du mercure dans l'oxyde de mercure
à l'intérieur des récipients fermés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a massa total está 
conservada na transformação do mercúrio no óxido do mercúrio 
dentro dos recipientes closed.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la massa totale 
si conserva nella trasformazione di mercurio nell'ossido del mercurio 
all'interno dei contenitori chiusi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η συνολική μάζα 
συντηρείται στο μετασχηματισμό του υδραργύρου εμπορευματοκιβώτια 
οξειδίων υδραργύρου στα κλειστά μέσα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la masa total está 
conservada en la transformación del mercurio en el óxido del 
mercurio dentro de los envases cerrados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktionen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geschlossene Behälter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quecksilber</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quecksilberoxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sauerstoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réactions chimiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">récipients fermés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mercure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">oxyde de mercure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'oxygène</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reações químicas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
